# Excel and CSV read and write example

## Read source files

```{r read_files}

## Read data from Excel file
excel_test <- read.csv("testtable_source.xlsx", stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

## Read data from CSV file
csv_test <- read.csv("testtable_source.csv", stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

## Display data from Excel
summary(excel_test)

## Display data from CSV
summary(csv_test)

```
